channel.title: Construction :O A House!
channel.description: I made a house with walls beds and everything (upstairs not shown in picture) Look at the picture but i got one problem with it and it's that people can't see it :|

item.title: Construction :O A House!
item.dc:creator: @IcyPimp IcyPimp
item.description:
@IcyPimp wrote:

hogesar:

You say how long it took Jagex to do it. but really we’re not doing it from scratch like that. And not only this - several re-mades were probably done to sort out lag and general server space etc - so you can’t really use that as a point

Erm…it doesn’t take that long to design something. I promise it didn’t take them 4 years to make the objects, and one year to make the houses…-.-

Read full topic

Itachi Uchiha:

lol i need to find out how to add con tab then ill have like 90% construction that looks like rs i have all other stuff on my emoscape client

Doubt it…like everybody has been saying, it took Jagex FOREVER to make POH’s. Some kid who has been working for one week on the project and who’s only known a little bit about java for a couplr of months isn’t going to be able to make it.

Dur…durdur…“Jagex” = “Java Game Experts”…

Deedee! I Jaba gayme espert too!

item.title: Construction :O A House!
item.dc:creator: @quest_rs quest rs
item.description:
@quest_rs wrote:

[quote=“shadow12, post:5, topic:20006”]No actually mate it’s rather simple and i gonna release a TUT tomorrow how to add all the stuff to make a proper house with stairs and stuff

[glow=red,2,300]Only Problem is no one can see it!![/glow][/quote]

fedexer’s code refreshes when ever some one logs in, so if your players were standing where the building is, and some one logs in, the people standing there will see it but the person logging it wouldn’t :S. (tested this with a few friends a couple weeks ago)

Read full topic

item.title: Construction :O A House!

item.description:
@shadow12 wrote:

actually it’s not done by fedxer (sorry if i spelt name wrong) it’s basic for people who want to make stuff at the moment i have a problem with making everyone able to see it but soon as it done i making it only to be done in a certain area then hopefully i can make full Poh i have the basic outline for Poh but i need a helper

item.title: Construction :O A House!
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Dang you people are sometimes confusing. Anyways javaisnotrecognized has a point. You programmed it through the client and you probably used -fedexer- 's tutorials to make it. If you wanted to do somthing that shakes this community you would teach us how to make a new web client that can be personally edited (not using moparscape at all.) Or you could make POHs which will be coming out in the next few months (the heat rises with all of the building tutorials coming out these days…) Dang I mine as well work on POHs myself. But I see that you understand so - good!

~Mod Taharok

Read full topic

item.title: Construction :O A House!

item.description:
@IcyPimp wrote:

Javacisnotrecognized:

I’m willing to bet your building was all client side

[quote=“shadow12, post:5, topic:20006”]No actually mate it’s rather simple and i gonna release a TUT tomorrow how to add all the stuff to make a proper house with stairs and stuff

[glow=red,2,300]Only Problem is no one can see it!![/glow][/quote]

Rofl…roflmao…lmao…

And tasty, he’s not a good coder if it’s clientside. The trick is getting it so it’s NOT client side. That = worthy.

@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

But… you haven’t actually done that yet. Nobody else can see it…[br][size=1]Posted at: October 25, 2006, 03:26:37 PM[/size][hr][quote=“tasty noob, post:6, topic:20006”]Or he used the the object.cfg to place them? If thats clientside, he must be a VERY good coder?

And clientside is when you edit the client itself rather tha nthe server, and its not really there, but it appears to be.

EDIT:
Posted that as i posted this, maybe it is clientside, or it isnt global kind of like items back in mythscape when you dropped em.[/quote]
